summary: Frontend testing for PWA My Coach Developer UI/UX improvements. All main features verified working correctly.
passed_tests: Login page: MCD logo displays correctly
Login page: Title 'My Coach Developer' visible
Coach Developer login: Successfully authenticates
Coach Developer header: Home button present with data-testid='nav-home-btn'
Coach Developer header: My Coaches button present with data-testid='nav-my-coaches-btn'
Coach Developer header: Templates button present with data-testid='nav-templates-btn'
Coach Developer header: Calendar button present with data-testid='nav-calendar-btn'
Coach Developer header: Settings button present with data-testid='nav-settings-btn'
Coach Developer header: MCD App Logo present with data-testid='mcd-app-logo'
Coach Developer header: Coach-only buttons (My Development, My Profile) NOT shown
Coach Developer: Sync status shows 'Saved' (not 'Sync failed')
My Coaches page: Dismissible tip visible with X button
My Coaches page: Tip dismisses when X clicked
My Coaches page: Tip stays dismissed after page reload (localStorage persistence)
Coach login: Successfully authenticates and redirects to /coach
Coach header: Home button present
Coach header: My Development button present with data-testid='nav-my-development-btn'
Coach header: Calendar button present
Coach header: My Profile button present with data-testid='nav-my-profile-btn'
Coach header: Coach Developer-only buttons (My Coaches, Templates, Settings) NOT shown
Coach: 'Synced' status visible (not 'Sync failed')
Coach My Development: Page loads correctly
Coach My Development: View Mode select present (Session/Parts toggle) with data-testid='viewmode-select'
Coach My Development: Timeframe select present with data-testid='timeframe-select'
Coach My Development: Shows 'By Sessions' option
Coach My Development: Shows 'All Time' timeframe option
Coach My Profile: Page loads correctly
Coach My Profile: Photo upload button (camera icon) present with data-testid='upload-photo-btn'
Coach My Profile: Photo upload input present with data-testid='photo-upload-input'
Coach My Profile: Role/Job Title input present
Coach My Profile: Age Group/Team input present
Coach My Profile: Department input present
Coach My Profile: Coaching Focus/Bio textarea present
Coach My Profile: Save Changes button present
Coach My Profile: Log Out button present
critical_code_review_comments: AppHeader.jsx correctly implements role-based navigation: Coach Developer gets (Home, My Coaches, Templates, Calendar, Settings), Coach gets (Home, My Development, Calendar, My Profile)
SyncStatusIndicator.jsx correctly shows 'Synced' for coaches (not 'Sync failed') - uses simple online/offline check for coach users
DismissibleTip.jsx correctly stores dismissed tips in localStorage with DISMISSED_TIPS_KEY='mcd_dismissed_tips'
CoachDevelopment.jsx has proper viewmode toggle (Sessions/Parts) and timeframe options (All Time, This Month, 6 Months, This Year, Custom Range)
CoachMyProfile.jsx has proper photo upload button with camera icon and file input for image upload
context_for_next_testing_agent: UI/UX improvements verified: 1) Login page MCD logo working. 2) Coach Developer header has Home, My Coaches, Templates, Calendar, Settings buttons. 3) Coach header has Home, My Development, Calendar, My Profile buttons. 4) Sync status shows 'Synced' not 'Sync failed' for coaches. 5) DismissibleTip on My Coaches page works with localStorage persistence. 6) CoachDevelopment has Session/Parts toggle and timeframe filters. 7) CoachMyProfile has camera button for photo upload.

coach_developer_header.notes: Unified single header with all navigation buttons

coach_header.notes: Unified single header with role-appropriate buttons

sync_status.notes: Shows 'Synced' for coaches, 'Saved' for coach developers - no 'Sync failed' errors

dismissible_tip.notes: Tip on My Coaches page can be dismissed with X button, stays dismissed after reload via localStorage

coach_development_page.notes: Has Session/Parts viewmode toggle and timeframe filter (All Time, This Month, 6 Months, This Year, Custom Range)

coach_profile_photo_upload.notes: Camera button visible on profile avatar, file input available for photo selection
